name: AbortionElective
title: Abortion, Elective
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent the concept of an elective induced abortion procedure, referring to an abortion performed for non-medical reasons and by choice of the pregnant individual.),(Data Element Scope: This value set contains a single concept intended for use with data elements related to obstetric procedures, specifically pregnancy termination, within electronic health records or clinical quality measures. The concept would belong to the Procedure semantic category.),(Inclusion Criteria: The only concept included in this value set is "Elective termination of pregnancy". This concept covers induced abortion procedures performed voluntarily and not due to fetal anomalies, maternal health risks, or other clinical indications.),(Exclusion Criteria: Any concepts describing spontaneous abortions, missed abortions, or induced abortions for specific medical reasons are excluded from this value set. Concepts providing additional details about the abortion procedure method, gestational age, or other clinical characteristics are not included. The value set is intentionally narrow in scope to capture only elective, non-medically indicated induced abortions.)
